subject: Attention beneficiary ATM parc
body:
Attention beneficiary ATM parcel,
I am Diplomatic Agent  Johnny Alfred Williams I have been trying to reach you on your Email about four hours now, just to inform you about my successful arrival at the International Airport with your ATM CARD parcel worth $9.7 Million Dollars which I have been instructed by EXPRESS DELIVERY COMPANY to be deliver to you.
The Airport Authority demanded for all the legal back up papers to prove to them that the ATM is no way related with drug nor fraud money, I have presented the papers to them and they are very much pleased with the papers which I presented but the only thing that is still keeping me here is the airport Anti-drug/terrorist clearance certificate and International Delivery Permit which is not placed on the parcel, one of the Airport Authority has advise that we get the delivery tag so that I can exit the airport immediately and make my delivery successful. I try to reason with them but they stated that 
the delivery tag will cost you just $70 Dollars only to get the two documents placed on your parcel as that documents will enable me to complete the delivery to your door step successfully.
Please try as much as you can to reach me on Phone below as I can not afford to spend much time here . You can direct the tag fee to our Head office as they will get back paper there for you and they are entitled to receive and make any payment to foreign countries authority. text me or Email me with below information to enable me know your arrangement for the $70. EMAIL : 
agencyalfredgd@hotmail.com
 
Meanwhile you are advice to reconfirm the below information upon contacting me to avoid delivery to wrong person.
1-  Your Full    Name
2-  Your Delivery Address  
3-  Your Contact Telephone Number
Below is the information where the payment of $70 will be transfer to Federal Ministry of Finance where the Tag Delivery will be issue in your
name.
Text or Email me the payment information as soon as you made the payment available to the name of Ottawa James in Ministry of Finance.
Email: 
agencyalfredgd@hotmail.com
Best regard.
DIPLOMATIC J. A. Williams.

subject: Re: Attention beneficiary ATM parc
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the delivery of my ATM CARD parcel. I appreciate the update on your successful arrival at the airport. However, I have a few questions before proceeding with any payments.

Firstly, could you please provide me with more information about the Express Delivery Company that instructed you to deliver the parcel? I would like to know more about their reputation and track record.

Secondly, I understand that there are legal back up papers required by the Airport Authority. Could you explain in more detail what these papers are and why they are necessary? It's important for me to have a clear understanding of all the procedures involved.

Lastly, I would like to confirm the authenticity of this transaction. Is there any way for me to verify your identity as a Diplomatic Agent? Perhaps you could provide me with some form of official identification or documentation?

I look forward to your response and further clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Caprice
